name: expansivity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the amount that a material increases or decreases per unit of length as the result of a one degree change in temperature: expansivity of The expansivity of copper does not change significantly in this temperature range. The expansivities of the two materials become more divergent with temperature. Compare
expansivenessRelated words
expand
expansive
More examplesFewer examplesThe thermal expansivity of silver increased at high temperatures.The experiment tests whether two pieces of glass with different densities have different expansivities.These equations can be used for calculating expansivity.The effect of the temperature increase is measured as linear expansivity.
